summary.description:

The past week and month had observable variation in cloud levels (up 1596 m), feels like temperature (up 2.1°C), outside temperature (up 2.6°C), and inside temperature (up 2.3°C) when compared to today.

summary.summary: Inside; temperature should feel pleasantly mild. Outside; mild and pleasant. Also, humidity should not be a concern and calm and still conditions are expected. A few light raindrops may fall, partial cloudiness with some periods of sun, and it’s dark. Changeable conditions.
